resources.string: To play the game you must press any of the nine lights in order to either turn it on or off. Pressing any of the lights will toggle it and the adjacent lights. The game is over when all lights are on and the goal is to win in as few moves as you can.
Go to settings and select one of the three options of color and then press CHANGE to change the color of the lights.
CONGRATULATIONS! YOUR NUMBER OF MOVES WAS:

Hi there! I am Luiz and I am a computer science major at the University of Massachusetts Lowell. I started programming when I was 19 years old and this is the fifth game-related project that I have done in my short career. Once I graduate I intend to become a game developer since gaming has been my passion since I was a kid.
